channel.title: ShameGolf on Peter's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in ShameGolf on Peter's Notebook

item.title: HobbyNotebook / Shame Golf (-12)
item.description: Miniature Shame Golf is a game of painting your miniatures.

item.title: Hobby Painting
item.description: I paint small plastic monsters and soldiers for fun. I use a specific Instagram tag for the finished ones. I started calling them “band shots” since it was usually a group who had been painted at once all posed together. I’m also tracking my “shame golf” score and I’m doing … well? I tried to build a “better” list of the Mortal Realms Magazine contents, but, FauxHammer beat me to it … mostly … Mine doesn’t have the screaming advertisments jammed in there, and, might eventually have links to rules for the minis.
